title: Knockout Lee Sin bruises the opposition

replies.body: Insted of making new skins for people who don't need them, Riot should make skins for people who dont have many, such as {{champion:83}}  or {{champion:114}}

You mean {{champion:238}}  He has one skin.
he has two skt and shock blade

Lol, you actually could at the time that post was written.

Ok, 
1. SKT Zed is not meant for the special effects or anything of the sort; honestly it doesn't count as a new skin for Zed.   Rather, it is made to celebrate SKT pride.  
2. Zed was released in November 13th, 2011.  As of today, it is July 3rd, 2015; 3 and a half years since Zed has received a new skin.  
3. Yet here we are, Lee Sin (with already plenty of skins) gets a new one.  So does Rek'Sai who came out not too long ago.  Again, the same is with yasuo and his project skin.  This also includes Draven.  
4. However, thanks Riot for releasing the Zac skin!

Want to ignore wall of text? Heres the summary: Zed is in need of a new skin, not these other champions that are getting new ones .

Nooo noo we need legend of (link) {{champion:157}} Yasuo skin

yah lee sin already has 10 skins or something

There's a reason they both aren't getting skins right now, yorick's is painfully obvious in that he's getting a sion level rework, so they don't want to make a skin before he completely changes, having to basically recreate the skin. As for fiora i'm certain that it's because she's getting looked at to for a small gameplay update, she could be looking at a skin in the near future but who knows
As in Sion level rework, you mean Yorick will be removed from the game and replaced with another champion with the same name with only one of his abilities?

{{champion:55}} Ladies and Gentle men it's what you've been waiting for the match of the century. In the right corner he's mean he's lean he's blind It's knock out{{champion:64}}  and in the left corner he's a bucket of bolts boom boom {{champion:53}}.

{{champion:161}} Alright let's get this match underway I'll be your announcer along with-

{{champion:254}} The queen of fist.

{{champion:161}} No one is falling you that.

{{champion:254}} Well at least I'm more popular than you. Now quit talking it's punch time.

{{champion:55}} Round 1 start!

{{champion:64}} I'm gonna put you in the plastic bin when I'm done you bucket of bolts.

{{champion:53}} ...

{{champion:64}} I'm so pretty and so fast I'm gonna whip back into beta.

{{champion:53}} ...

{{champion:64}} You think you're mean well your nothing but an obese calculator.

{{champion:53}} (Punches Lee Sin in the head)

{{champion:64}} Gaurahhhhhhh (His head is fully removed)

{{champion:55}} Crap that's bad

{{champion:161}} OH MY GOD HE JUST TOOK OF LEE'S HEAD! Oh how did this go so wrong.

{{champion:254}} Maybe it wasn't a good idea to have a human box a robot who's built to kill.
Finally a decent author around here
I hope that's sarcasm. I really do.

well the hole purpose of this was would a human really beat a robot in a boxing match and expect not to die. I mean I'm not a the best author I know I'm not lightdragon I just write what I think would fit this skin.

I understand that, and I like the plot and thought the story was funny. However, he said "finally a decent author" and I can't excuse an egregious lack of grammar and spelling. Not trying to be a douche, just saying - if you're gonna make a big long post on the boards, make it correct. Because really... "No one is *falling* you that?" If you had just reread your post once you could have cleaned up so many simple errors and made the story make more sense for the reader.
Little Mac is a league champ now. Nice
So who is that on Gragas's arm in the background?
There are two of them, they are Gragas' women assistants.
Or you know it could just be random female citizens of valoran. Doesn't have to be a champion you know.
Shoulda been *Lee*tle Mac
I love how you guys revamped the ability animations to make this skin use the fists rather than feet for Q and R. Love this skin. Great job, Riot.
Agreed, and the gong sound and symbols on his W is a nice gimmick as well.
